messageBody:
One way get around this problem is place your test classes in
WEB_INF/classes directory (following the package structure). That way server
checks if a class is changed it will load changed classes. The WEB_INF
directory is the directory which belongs to your servlet.

Another way to get around this problem is to have your own classloader to
load your test classes every time you hit the servlet.

I hope it solves the problem.
Thanks
Babu
